title: Didn't Get The Graves Chroma
body:
Hello , I'm Gold In Solo Duo And I Didn't Get The Pearl Chroma For Victorious Graves 
Even Though My Friends Already Got It And Also Got The Flex One , Is That A Bug ?

replies.body: Those ranked rewards are still being delivered over the course of November, but if you still don't see yours in about a week I'd suggest reaching out to your EUNE agents in a ticket to see what might have gone wrong with yours.
